title: Traditional Wedding
description: Traditional Wedding offers a classic and timeless wedding experience. Embrace age-old traditions and customs to create a ceremony filled with cultural significance and beauty.

title: Virtual Wedding
description: Virtual Wedding is  gateway to a modern and technologically advanced wedding. Celebrate your special day online, connecting with loved ones from around the in a virtual environment.

title: Destination Wedding
description: Destination Wedding is your ticket to an exotic and breathtaking wedding in a faraway paradise. Say your vows in a stunning location, making your special day a memorable adventure.

title: Weekend Wedding
description: Weekend Wedding extends the joy of your wedding celebration over a whole weekend. Enjoy an extended party with friends and family, creating lasting memories.

title: Celebrity Wedding
description: Weekend Wedding extends the joy of your wedding celebration over a whole weekend. Enjoy an extended party with friends and family, creating lasting memories.

title: Adventure Wedding
description: Adventure Wedding is for the bold and unconventional. Say I do in an exciting and unique way, creating memories filled with thrilling experiences at an affordable price.
